//OpenComment2: EVERY STRING IS LOCATED IN THE FILE LIKE IT IS IN-GAME. ORDER: RIGHT, LEFT, DOWN
//OpenComment3: Comments are written like strings because JSON's limits
physicsmod.gui.noblock: ブロックが見つかりません。
physicsmod.gui.nosound: 効果音、または音楽が見つかりません。
physicsmod.gui.customizecape: マントをカスタマイズ
physicsmod.menu.main.title: 物理演算の設定...
physicsmod.menu.animation.search.title: アニメーションを探しています
physicsmod.menu.blocks.search.title: ブロックを探しています
physicsmod.menu.particle.search.title: パーティクルを探しています
physicsmod.menu.sound.search.title: サウンドを探しています
physicsmod.menu.physics.ocean.error: エラー！海の物理演算はOptifineやImmersive Portals Modに対応していません。 もしForgeを使っているならOculus + Rudium Modを使用してください。もしFabricを使用しているならIris + Sodiumを使用してください。
physicsmod.menu.physics.collapse.error: サーバーのコンフィグで変更できるのはシングルプレイヤー以外の崩壊設定のみです。 (config/physicsmod/physics_server_config.json).
physicsmod.menu.physics.liquid.error: エラー！水の物理演算はOptifineやImmersive Portals Modに対応していません。 もしForgeを使っているならOculus + Rudium Modを使用してください。もしFabricを使用しているならIris + Sodiumを使用してください。
physicsmod.menu.physics.snow.error: エラー！雪の物理演算はOptifineやImmersive Portals Modに対応していません。 もしForgeを使っているならOculus + Rudium Modを使用してください。もしFabricを使用しているならIris + Sodiumを使用してください。
physicsmod.menu.physics.dynamicblocks.er: ブロックの物理演算は、Immersive Portals Modに対応していません。
physicsmod.menu.main.prorequired: プロバージョンが必要です！!
physicsmod.gui.verify: Physics Modの不正コピーがないか検証中...
physicsmod.gui.getcode.info: デフォルトのブラウザでPatreonの検証ページを開いてください。
physicsmod.gui.entercode: エンターキーでPhysics Mod のコードを認証する。(ボタンをクリックでコードを取得する)
physicsmod.menu.general.title.main.info: 一度にアクティブにできる物理オブジェクトの数、または使用されるスレッドの最大数を定義します。 また、 いくつかのパーティクル設定が含まれています。
physicsmod.menu.general.title: 基本設定
physicsmod.menu.general.cputhreads.info: After changing this you will need to reload the world to apply changes.
physicsmod.menu.general.pvpservercompati: Enables Physics for entities that simply disappear without triggering the death event. When enabled bees going into hives, mob transformations and spawning mobs in peaceful mode will trigger physics.
physicsmod.menu.general.crackphysicspart: Enables Physics for particles while cracking a block.
physicsmod.menu.general.sprintingphysics: Enables Physics for particles while sprinting on a block.
physicsmod.menu.general.eatingphysicspar: Enables Physics for particles while eating.
physicsmod.menu.general.serverblockPhysi: Enables Physics for particles when receiving fall damage and other block particles received by the server packets.
physicsmod.menu.gravity.customize.reset: Do you really want to reset your gravities?
physicsmod.menu.gravity.customize.title: Gravity Rules (join a world to see dimensions)
physicsmod.menu.mobs.title.main.info: Change the behaviour of mobs when they die. Turn them into ragdolls, their individual parts or let them crumble into pieces!
physicsmod.menu.mobs.title: Mob Settings
physicsmod.menu.mob.ragdollbreak.info: This needs either the type <Ragdoll Breaking> or <Ragdoll Blood> to be enabled
physicsmod.menu.mobs.customize.title: Mob Rules
physicsmod.menu.mobs.customize.reset: Do you really want to reset your mob settings?
physicsmod.menu.mobs.edit.title: Edit Mob %s
physicsmod.menu.blocks.title.main.info: Adjust the way blocks crumble when they are getting destroyed. Small particles, the entire block or fractured pieces. Whatever your heart desires!
physicsmod.menu.blocks.title: Block Settings
Describes at which distance to the player (in blocks) it should stop activating block physics.
physicsmod.menu.blocks.customize.reset: Do you really want to reset your block settings?
physicsmod.menu.blocks.customize.title: Block Rules
physicsmod.menu.blocks.edit.title: Edit Block %s
physicsmod.menu.ocean.title.main.info: Experience the thrill of navigating the vast, open oceans of Minecraft with realistic ocean physics that allow you to feel the power of the waves and the wind on your sails!
physicsmod.menu.ocean.title: Ocean Settings
physicsmod.menu.ocean.title.warning: Ocean Settings §c(Increase wave distance to shore to avoid visual glitches!)
physicsmod.menu.ocean.chunkgrouping.info: Increasing the setting will result in an increase in frame rate, but may also cause stuttering during chunk updates. Decreasing the setting will improve stuttering, but may decrease frame rate.
physicsmod.menu.ocean.hitbox.info: Adjusts the hitbox of blocks to be correct, this might result in a kick or ban on servers so use it with caution
physicsmod.menu.ocean.blockrange.info: This decides how far away from the shore the water has to be to form big waves. Also takes into account the deepness of the water body.
physicsmod.menu.ocean.reset: Do you really want to reset your ocean settings?
physicsmod.menu.dynamicblocks.title.main: Advance your gameplay by turning vines, doors, trapdoors and hanging signs into physics objects.
physicsmod.menu.dynamicblocks.title: Dynamic Block Settings (PRO VERSION REQUIRED)
physicsmod.menu.dynamicblocks.maxloadedb: Only activates the nearest X amount of block physics
Do you really want to reset your dynamic block settings?
physicsmod.menu.dynamicblocks.add.title: Add Dynamic Block
physicsmod.menu.dynamicblocks.edit.title: Edit Dynamic Block
physicsmod.menu.cloth.title.main.info: Turn capes, banners, leashes into a physics simulation. You can also create your own capes or use capes created by the community!
physicsmod.menu.cloth.title: Cloth Settings (PRO VERSION REQUIRED)
Enable/Disable your Mojang cape when cape physics are enabled
physicsmod.menu.cloth.bannerdistance.inf: The distance at which the banner physics switch back to default minecraft banners.
physicsmod.menu.cape.selection.title: Cape Selection
physicsmod.menu.cape.customization.title: Cape Customization (apply it to certain players or everyone)
physicsmod.menu.items.title.main.info: Get ready for some action! Snowballs, Enderpearls and Eggs can now shatter into pieces when hitting an object!
physicsmod.menu.items.title: Projectile Settings (PRO VERSION REQUIRED)
physicsmod.menu.liquid.title.main.info: BETA! Test liquid physics in Minecraft and see how it could look in the not so distant future!
physicsmod.menu.liquid.title: Liquid Settings (PRO VERSION REQUIRED)
physicsmod.menu.liquid.waterdensity.info: This controls the density of infinite water sources.
physicsmod.menu.liquid.liquidthreads.inf: More threads can improve the FPS of liquids but might decrease your Minecraft FPS.
physicsmod.menu.liquid.warning: This is a beta release of the liquids so that you can play around and test them. To spawn a continuous liquid source break an enchanting table (you can stop the source by placing a block on the source, everything is only CLIENT SIDE). Blocks that create a vanishing liquid source: melon, wet sponge, pumpkin, cactus, filled water cauldron.
physicsmod.menu.snow.title.main.info: Minecraft never looked more ready for the winter. Plow through the snow, enjoy the atmosphere and even leave trails in it!
physicsmod.menu.snow.title: Snow Settings (PRO VERSION REQUIRED)
physicsmod.menu.snow.reset: Do you really want to reset your snow settings?
physicsmod.menu.snow.snowthickness.info: Thickness for snow. Only works with round + smooth shaded snow.
physicsmod.menu.snow.levelofdetail.info: Determines the level of detail for snow that is far from the viewer.
physicsmod.menu.snow.snowtrackentities.i: The selected amount of entities closest to the player leave tracks in the snow. Too high values result in delayed tracks.
physicsmod.menu.snow.snowtrackdistance.i: The maximum distance from the player where entities leave tracks in the snow. Too high values result in delayed tracks.
physicsmod.menu.snow.snowsmoothshading.i: Enable/Disable whether the snow has smooth shading
physicsmod.menu.snow.grasssnowy.info: Enable/Disable whether snowy grass blocks get replaced by actual snow
physicsmod.menu.snow.warning: Weak CPUs, too high chunk render distances or high snow quality might result in delayed snow tracks by entities and/or lag.
physicsmod.menu.sound.title.main.info: Just some sound settings for the weather and block physics. Not too exciting.
physicsmod.menu.sound.title: Sound Settings
physicsmod.menu.sound.soundvolume.info: This is multiplied by the blocks volume in the main Minecraft sound settings.
physicsmod.menu.sound.windvolume.info: This is multiplied by the weather volume in the main Minecraft sound settings.
This is multiplied by the ambient volume in the main Minecraft sound settings.
physicsmod.menu.animation.settings.title: ANIMATIONS
You want mobs blowing up into smoke? Go ahead and create your own despawn animations for blocks and mobs!
Despawn Animation Settings
physicsmod.menu.animation.settings.reset: Do you really want to reset your animations?
physicsmod.menu.animation.add.title: Create Animation (some particles can't be displayed in the menu)
physicsmod.menu.animation.edit.title: Edit Animation (some particles can't be displayed in the menu)
physicsmod.prop.animation.name: Name
physicsmod.menu.smoke.title.main.info: Don't get stuck in a building without a chimney. It could get very smoky!
physicsmod.menu.smoke.title: Smoke Settings (PRO VERSION REQUIRED)
physicsmod.menu.smoke.reset: Do you really want to reset your smoke settings?
physicsmod.menu.smoke.warning: Not all shaders are compatible. Temporal Anti-Aliasing (TAA, shader setting) can cause visual artifacts so I suggest disabling it.
physicsmod.menu.smoke.shadow.title: Select the shaderpack that you are using
physicsmod.menu.smoke.shadow.info: Set this to the shaderpack you are using (not all shaderpacks are supported but you can try different settings, it might work) for proper shadows.
physicsmod.menu.smoke.particledespawntim: The remaining time once the smoke hits open air and starts despawning.
physicsmod.menu.weather.title.main.info: Weather physics will apply wind to physics objects and turn all rain, snow and desert dust (NEW!) into particles also affected by wind forces!
physicsmod.menu.weather.title: Weather Settings
physicsmod.menu.weather.particlesamountr: Spawns X amount of particles per open air block. This has a high performance impact.
physicsmod.menu.weather.particlesamountt: Spawns X amount of particles additionally to the rain amount per open air block. This has a high performance impact.
physicsmod.menu.weather.rainstrength.inf: The total wind strength is calculated as follows: Clear Weather Strength + Rain Weather Strength (when it rains/thunders) + Thunder Weather Strength (when it thunders)
physicsmod.menu.weather.opacity.info: Existing particles in the world will not update to the new opacity setting. Please wait for new particles to spawn to see the updated opacity. Some shaders might ignore this setting.
physicsmod.menu.weather.reset: Do you really want to reset your weather settings?
physicsmod.menu.collapse.title.main.info: CAREFUL! This could destroy your entire house. Whenever a block gets placed/destroyed it triggers a structure collapse.
physicsmod.menu.collapse.title: Collapse Settings
